title: Understanding the Phases
text: Schizophrenia is a complex mental health disorder that progresses through different stages. Identifying these stages can help in understanding the condition better.

title: Initial Phase
text: The first phase of schizophrenia is often characterized by subtle changes in behavior and mood. This phase is known as the prodromal phase.

title: Acute Phase
text: During this phase, symptoms become more pronounced and may include hallucinations, delusions, and disorganized thinking. This is known as the acute phase.

title: Recovery Phase
text: After the acute phase, individuals may enter a period of recovery where symptoms are managed and reduced. This is known as the recovery phase.
